description: > NAME EQUAL TO (PUB. DIFFERENT) bio.tools/eagle_gxe | > NAME (EAGLE) SIMILAR TO (PUB. DIFFERENT) bio.tools/eagle (Eagle) | an algorithm that utilizes a small number of genomic features to predict tissue/cell type-specific enhancer-gene interactions | Enhancer And Gene Learning Ensemble method | EAGLE: an algorithm that utilizes small number of genomic features to predict tissue/cell type specific enhancer-gene interactions | EAGLE used all six features only derived from the enhancers and gene expression datasets, without providing more information like histone modification, methylation or other enhancer-gene (EG) detection datasets
name: EAGLE_autogenerated
